verbs.description: [ARG1: EPA administrator Scott Pruitt] [V: is] [ARGM-ADV: arguably] [ARG2: the greatest scammer in the Trump administration] . Here ’s a running list of his greatest grifts , from misuse of taxpayer funds to trying to hook his wife up with a Chick - fil - A franchise .
